summary: A brief email from August 5, 2019, indicating the presence of an 'Epstein team' and addressed to a Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. This suggests coordination or communication between Epstein's legal team and federal prosecutors shortly after Epstein's arrest.

persons.name: Co-Chief, Public Corruption Unit
persons.context: The recipient of an email indicating the 'Epstein team' is present, suggesting communication between Epstein's defense and federal prosecutors.

events.title: Email Regarding Epstein Team Presence
events.description: An email is sent to a Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the SDNY, stating 'Epstein team is here if you're still here.'

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: An email dated August 5, 2019, references the 'Epstein team' being present.
The communication is directed to a Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The timing is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, indicating ongoing legal proceedings and coordination.
